data.name: DUNKEEP
data.detailed_description:
DUNKEEP is a cozy roleplaying game where you take on the role of a tavern owner in the small town of Evergreen. Play games, serve customers, develop relationships, cook, craft, decorate or upgrade your tavern and make it your own.

After inheriting your uncle's old tavern it is up to you to do whatever it takes to bring DUNKEEP tavern back to its once glorious state. Starting with nothing you will earn money, do activities, and more to upgrade your tavern and make it your own.

Build Your Own Tavern

The tavern is one of the game’s key elements to progressing while playing DUNKEEP. Enter an open and compelling environment where you can serve customers, sell and buy items from merchants, accept quests, cook, craft, expand, decorate, and more.

Interesting Characters

Each character in the town of Evergreen has their own unique story and personality that you can develop relationships with that grow alongside your tavern as you play. You will start with nothing and a poorly ran tavern slowly improving customer satisfaction and developing strong enough relationships to earn rewards.

A Rich Cooking System

Cooking in DUNKEEPis no easy feat, find many different variations of ingredients and combine them at a selection of different cooking stations to discover unique recipes to sell to your customers or to create special fermentations and potions to sell or consume for yourself.

KEY FEATURES:

  • A rich cooking system
  • Fishing!
  • A simple but unique farming system to grow ingredients for tavern meals.
  • A recipe-based crafting system that integrates into the progression of the tavern gameplay.
  • A rewarding loot system to keep players wanting to find the next best thing.
  • A level-based progression system with perks and progressing skills.
  • Interesting characters to interact with

data.short_description: A cozy roleplaying game where you take on the role of a tavern owner in the small town of Evergreen. Play games, serve customers, develop relationships, cook, craft, decorate or upgrade your tavern and make it your own.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
